title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, and data flow. This task encompasses the following aspects: 1) Modular design for scalability and maintainability, 2) Secure data handling and storage, including encryption and access controls, with emphasis on compliance with relevant security and privacy regulations such as GDPR, PCI-DSS, and other banking standards (e.g., SWIFT, ISO 20022), ensuring that the design follows best practices for these regulations throughout the development process, 3) High availability and fault tolerance, with redundancy and failover mechanisms, ensuring performance optimization for real-time biometric processing, including load balancing and caching strategies using distributed caching systems like Redis or Memcached, 4) Integration with existing banking systems through secure APIs and data exchange protocols (consider adopting industry standards), 5) Performance monitoring and logging systems for security and performance analysis, collaborating with the task-decomposer to break down this task into smaller subtasks that can be assigned efficiently, 6) Implement a robust authentication mechanism that guarantees secure access to the system, considering multi-factor biometrics (fingerprint, facial recognition, and behavioral biometrics), ensuring that the implementation follows best practices for security and privacy throughout the development process, 7) Collaborate with the team to ensure compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations throughout the development process.

title: Biometric Authentication Module Design
description: Design the biometric authentication module, including fingerprint, facial recognition, and behavioral biometrics. Ensure that the design is scalable, secure, and user-friendly. Include a clear delineation of each component's role in the overall system architecture, considering edge cases for improved robustness. Provide detailed specifications for each module, emphasizing privacy concerns, performance optimizations, potential integration with existing banking systems, regional regulations impact on the design, and implementation of machine learning algorithms to improve biometric recognition accuracy and adaptability. Address data protection strategies to ensure compliance with GDPR, HIPAA, and other relevant privacy laws. Provide a comprehensive report detailing these aspects, which will be used for further discussion and approval. Update the rfc_state field to 'PENDING_IMPLEMENTATION' once the design is complete.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema for storing user data, biometric data, authentication logs, and related metadata. Consider data encryption (AES-256), access controls (Role-Based Access Control), compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA, PCI-DSS), and privacy by design principles. Ensure scalability, high availability, performance optimization for handling large volumes of data and concurrent requests, and data partitioning/sharding strategies using horizontally-partitioned shards and vertical partitioning for large tables. Define data retention policies based on regulatory requirements and industry best practices, and implement archiving/purging mechanisms to manage long-term storage. Incorporate audit logging and monitoring capabilities using tools like ELK Stack or Splunk for real-time analysis and alerting. Update the task when the database design is complete, including ER diagrams and SQL scripts, and provide a clear handoff plan for development. To ensure thoroughness, also consider integrating anomaly detection systems to flag potential security threats, and implement a disaster recovery plan. Once these aspects are addressed, update the task status to 'COMPLETE' and assign it to the database-specialist or devops-engineer for implementation.

title: Security and Compliance Review
description: Review security requirements, compliance standards, and data privacy regulations.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for the biometric authentication system.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend services, including biometric authentication, database integration, and security features.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate frontend and backend components, and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and security testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, configure infrastructure, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare technical documentation, user guides, and training materials.
